column4: after login something keeps filling up my RAM and swap space, however the system monitor doesn't show anything anormal. how can i find out which process is going wild?
because of the system monitor in my panel
user memory: 1.7G of 2G, used swap 850M of 3.8G
and that is definitely NOT normal, considering a normal RAM usage of <500M
i'm trying to post a screenshot but that takes time atm
that it spontaneously uses 3 gigs when idle?
view the processes and sort by resident memory
already tried, even with "all processes", it doesn't show something wrong
that's NOT caching. cache memory is shown separately
what does the top item in that list show for "resident memory" ?
